description:
Cluster Quality based Non-Reductional (CQNR) generates new samples proportional to the distribution of samples of the minority classes, without eliminating any sample of the minority class as noise.|

Effector protein predictor based on 3D structure (EPP3D) is based on the CQNR and predicts the type of effector protein from a PDB-file of unknown proteins.
name: CQNR and EPP3D
